body:
So I was just thinking how you know if how scouts look at college or high school athletes to have them move to the next level. So I was thinking why doesn't Avicus organize like a Tryout with everyone that wants to attend to have like a big tryout type thing when like the leaders of team spectate or watch players and see how they do. If they do well the team can make him an offer. 

Just a little brain storm

replies.body:
I was thinking something along those lines:
  • Make a forum post about Tryouts
  • Make a Tryout team (ex. Bad Company Tryouts)
  • Invite all people who say they are interested on the forum post onto the tryout team.
  • Hold a Scrimmage with the actual team. Then either:
  • A: have the real team split into 2 and fill in the spots with tryout players and play a match.
  • or B: split the tryout players into two teams and just have the actual team spec.
  • Then after that the team could do whatever they want to evaluate players.
